title: Heart Attack Risk Analysis
description: Complete machine learning pipeline to predict heart attack risk. Includes data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, model training, evaluation, and interactive visualizations.

title: Electric Vehicle Population Analysis
description: Comprehensive EDA of EV registrations with data quality checks, geographic breakdowns, range analysis, and interactive Plotly visualizations.

title: IAM Microservices Platform
description: Enterprise-grade Identity and Access Management platform built with Spring Boot microservices, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, and JWT. Supports authentication, authorization, and scalable deployment.

title: IAM Express API
description: Role-based user management REST API using Node.js, TypeScript, Express, and JWT with Zod validation and Dockerized deployment.

title: Climate-Driven Rainfall Variability
description: Research project analyzing the impact of climate drivers on rainfall variability. Features statistical modeling, data visualization, and predictive insights into climate patterns.
